Planes crash at Waihī Beach airfield https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/14/plane-crash-reported-at-waihi-beach/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/14/plane-crash-reported-at-waihi-beach/ Two planes have reportedly crashed at an airfield in Waihī Beach. Wed, 14 Aug 2024 01:38:08 +0000 There has been a report two planes have crashed at an airfield in Waihi Beach.
‘No cash, no housing’: Ruapehu District Council taps out, calls on Government to act https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/no-cash-no-housing-ruapehu-district-council-taps-out-calls-on-government-to-act/WUIIZGFH6FDGNESE3VERGDH674/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/no-cash-no-housing-ruapehu-district-council-taps-out-calls-on-government-to-act/WUIIZGFH6FDGNESE3VERGDH674/ Moana EllisRuapehu District Council says it is bowing out from financing housing developments. Wed, 14 Aug 2024 01:32:47 +0000 Six social housing units funded by the previous government’s Covid-19 response infrastructure fund were built in 2022 in Moore St, Ohakune, to help address Ruapehu district's lack of social housing.
